text: is a Japanese city in Saitama Prefecture on the island of Honshu.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Kumagaya" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 572. It has been recognized as a special city since 2009.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research (2011), Table 3. Retrieved 2012-12-18. The city has an estimated population of 153,392 (as of 1 June 2012) and the density of 1,270.8 people per km².CityPopulation.de, (熊谷市). Retrieved 2012-11-9. ==Geography== Kumagaya has a total area is 159.88 km². ==References== ==Other websites== * Kumagaya City website Category:Cities in Saitama Prefecture
title: Kumagaya
